4301680.name: Federica's Baking
4301680.description:
Federica's Baking is a simple productivity game with 2-frame hand-drawn animations featuring Federica, a kind and silly girl with only two goals in mind: to contribute to her family and to be even closer to her brother. You can help her achieve both goals by just focusing on your tasks with Federica's Pomodoro Timer.

HELP FEDERICA

Work alongside Federica, earn coins by every two minutes you focus, and spend them to buy the baking ingredients she needs to complete her orders. You can choose when to complete an order or let Federica choose by herself, but don't make her work when she wants to spend time with her brother, let them be together... please.

CHAT WITH FEDERICA

You can chat with Federica during some of your break sessions and as long as she wants to. You will know more about Federica and her family the more you chat with her, and she will get to know you too as she will ask you questions from time to time, but watch of how you reply to her, her mood can switch fast, just... don't make it worse.

FEATURES

  • Federica's Pomodoro Timer   (the only productivity tool you need)

  • Cute 2-frame hand-drawn animations   (made with love <3)

  • Siblings bonding   (sister and brother relationship)

  • Lost of dialogue   (Federica has a lot to say)

  • Two-choice path   (but expect lots of it)

  • Almost no sounds   (almost none)

  • No to-do list   (open notepad)

  • No music   (play your own)
